title: Still Relevant After All These Years
text:
Who'd've thought, right? This platform ought to be a dinosaur by now; however, I was quite surprised to hear that amongst the under-30 crowd, YouTube is almost keeping pace with TikTok. So, not bad, and not under the ownership of Chinese citizens. Bonus.

Why not five stars then? Ads, ads, ads everywhere! I really don't blame YouTube for that as they're just keeping pace with the rest of our postmodern world. Oh but think again â€” why not blame YouTube? If they want to be out in front of the race, why not truly take the most progressive stance and show fewer ads? Am I right or am I RIGHT? Let's all be more-evolved capitalists. ğŸ‹ğŸ½ğŸ’¸ğŸ˜‡
